_comment: Stress fixture: unstable timestamp injection. Tests that execution fingerprint is NOT affected by wall-clock timestamps.
description: Inject varying wall-clock timestamps into the execution context. The fingerprint must remain stable because timestamp_epoch is always 0 in deterministic paths.
assertion: Fingerprint must be identical regardless of wall-clock time. timestamp_epoch must always be 0 in fingerprint paths.
notes: Wall-clock timestamps appear in human-readable logs only. Never in fingerprint computation. Uses ctx.DeterministicTime() which always returns epoch zero.
